page.title: 17PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Chips beans and bangers In chips, beans and bangers you can have five people to play. First of all you chose someone to be swinger. They swing you round. You have to shout out one of these words - if they shout out Chips the swinger swings you round really fast. If you shout beans he swings you round slowly. If you say bangers you have to say bang when you land. Then the swinger will give you an action to do, he will turn away and say clockworks begin. Then she says clockworks stop and see who is the best one then they will be the swinger.
